ending_theme: #1: "Honjitsu, Mankai Watashi Iro! (本日、満開ワタシ色!)" by Katsura Hinagiku with Hakuou Academy Student Council Trio starring Itou Shizuka with Yahagi Sayuri & Nakao Eri & Asano Masumi (eps 1-17)
#2: "Karakoi ~Dakara Shoujo wa Koi wo Suru~ (カラコイ～だから少女は恋をする～)" by Kugimiya Rie and Shiraishi Ryoko (eps 18-24)
